song.title: I have chosen you
song.lyrics:
[V1] I have chosen you, I have called you by name, O that you may go and witness to the world. Come and live in me and bear fruit that will last, For you’re no longer servants cherished friends.
[V2] Contemplate my wounds and my heart that was pierced And accept the life I long to give to you. Come believe in me, I’m risen from the dead, And when I come in glory you’ll see my face.
[V3] Come receive the spirit of power and of peace. Witness to my name, for you I gave my life. Do not be afraid of giving up your life. For you are my disciples, my chosen Friends.
[V4] Come console my people, their Shepherd is here. Share with them the joy that I have given you. Show to all you meet the Lord’s own tenderness. If you remain in me, then you will have life.
